name: Ugur Güdükbay
content: Uğur Güdükbay Uğur Güdükbay Department of Computer Engineering Bilkent University Ankara, Turkey Tel: 290 1386 Schedule Short Biography Academic Experience Education Research Research Interests Modeling and Visualization of Complex Graphical Environments, Crowd Simulation, Physically-Based Modeling and Animation (Modeling and Visualization Research Group) Multimedia Databases (Multimedia Databases Research Group) Research Repository Sponsored Projects Publications Graduate Student Supervision Thesis Topics for New Graduate Students CS390/490 Research Project Topics for 2025-2026 Academic Year Computer Graphics Related Software Tools Teaching Current Courses: CS 102 Algorithms and Programming II CS 465 / CS 575 Computer Graphics I Past Courses: CS 112 Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming CS 201 Fundamental Structures of Computer Science I CS 228 Logic Design and Computer Organization CS 353 Database Systems CS 466 Computer Graphics II CS 478 / CS 564 Computational Geometry CS 565 Applications of Computer Graphics CS 281 Computers and Data Organization Professional Activities ZQAI: Machine Learning & Deep Learning for Data Analysis & Compression e-mail: (gudukbay at cs.bilkent.edu.tr)
